
---
title: '【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11_Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙_AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W_120W 快充'
categories: 
 - 新媒体
 - IT 之家
 - 热榜
headimg: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/b714a89b-0948-4e64-957b-3f4f4dfb5140.jpeg'
author: IT 之家
comments: false
date: Fri, 29 Oct 2021 08:47:57 GMT
thumbnail: 'https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/b714a89b-0948-4e64-957b-3f4f4dfb5140.jpeg'
---

<div>   
<p data-vmark="2b2b"><a class="s_tag" href="https://www.ithome.com/" target="_blank">IT之家</a> 10 月 29 日消息，Redmi 在 10 月 28 日召开发布会，正式发布了 Redmi Note 11、Redmi Note 11 Pro、Redmi Note 11 Pro + 三款手机。</p><p data-vmark="bfcd">IT之家已经拿到了 Redmi Note 11 和 Redmi Note 11 Pro + 这两款手机，<span class="accentTextColor">现在为大家带来开箱图赏</span>。</p><h2 data-vmark="8369">Redmi Note 11</h2><p data-vmark="f951">Redmi Note 11 的包装盒整体采用白色为底色，“Note 11”为渐变的橙红色，还标有“5G”和“33W”字样。</p><p data-vmark="b875"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/b714a89b-0948-4e64-957b-3f4f4dfb5140.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="171c"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/387a6396-3f5b-49f9-83ed-ad0a9245656a.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="f406">除了手机本体，Redmi Note 11 的包装盒内还有<span class="accentTextColor">数据线和 33W 充电器</span>。</p><p data-vmark="4c62"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/72e95e53-544d-44f7-8338-5022459b6351.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="d244"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/38e6a3a0-42f4-43d9-9ad5-2d53f126f0f7.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="cf87">Redmi Note 11 5G 搭载<span class="accentTextColor">天玑 810 处理器</span>，内置 5000mAh 电池，支持 33W 快充与新一代 5G 双卡双待，配备 X 轴线性马达。</p><p data-vmark="8de2"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/bb6958d1-cd43-42f4-aa58-f80efe7851d0.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="d3c4"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/d86e3791-a432-478d-a752-b04db2795cb7.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="69a3"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/d8bff593-9407-4ccf-bda6-3fb056433024.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="409d">屏幕方面，Redmi Note 11 5G 采用 6.6 英寸 FHD + 屏幕，<span class="accentTextColor">支持 50/60/90Hz 三挡刷新率以及无级色温调节</span>。</p><p data-vmark="4cbc"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/a8608554-7c9a-47c8-8526-405a7602c137.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="2549"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/656fd720-d6d7-4646-ba81-ef89e414f0c2.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="4787"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/f3a409da-758b-44ac-b37a-8ed6ad16a7c7.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="9ae1">相机方面，Redmi Note 11 5G 配备 1600 万美颜前置摄像头，后置 5000 万超清双摄，包括 5000 万主摄与 800 万超广角。</p><p data-vmark="d111"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/b4dc210d-9f05-4331-b4d8-7d54fc99c94f.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="dc7f"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/5f562bc2-c8e3-4a37-9251-92379c2effe7.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="de9e">此外，IT之家还拿到了 Redmi Note 11 的一款保护壳，一起来看看吧。</p><p data-vmark="12a2"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/ced5a203-134b-427e-923b-bce0e641b0d8.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="cf54"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/3dd050ad-c5a1-470f-be15-010f7251f62e.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="8bda"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/0248a23b-d8ec-495a-8af7-c1b85a2f43b8.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="c6ec"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/c686ff69-6946-4810-9306-d5a338522c07.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><h2 data-vmark="b098">Redmi Note 11 Pro+</h2><p data-vmark="fcb2">Redmi Note 11 Pro + 的包装盒同样采用整体白色设计，标有“5G”和“120W”，除了手机本体外，<span class="accentTextColor">还赠送数据线和 120W 充电器</span>。</p><p data-vmark="6e71"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/49983a41-94b6-4515-a20d-9887fa0c3691.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="45cb"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/b9e92499-8bfc-411d-a59d-cf5afd6b111b.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="9cee"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/a7a87998-f36c-407e-b21d-23d24175842a.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="03cd"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/25f63549-7f92-4875-9f05-5b021f9cdeb8.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="c692">Redmi Note 11 Pro + 外观采用<span class="accentTextColor"> AG 磨砂玻璃工艺</span>。该手机支持<span class="accentTextColor">满血版 120W 快充</span>，内置 4500mAh 电池，官方称 15 分钟可充至 100%，同时采用 MTW 多极耳双电芯与高效率双电荷泵，配备 VC 液冷材料。</p><p data-vmark="42d3"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/56f9b017-a495-45b3-acc8-1b6640ed6a39.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="fef7"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/795f19d0-cdf0-44bb-84b5-1bfabcad0d37.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="00cb">屏幕方面，该手机采用 6.67 英寸三星 AMOLED 屏幕，<span class="accentTextColor">支持 120Hz 屏幕刷新率与 360Hz 触控采样率</span>。</p><p data-vmark="a3c9"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/261a3875-e1c3-4fa0-b51b-b519c4294e82.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="42bf"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/cfb0b43a-db7b-4772-b660-1f74d1022f58.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="a356">音质方面，该手机搭载旗舰级“对称立体声”双扬声器，与 JBL 联合调校，支持杜比全景声，还有 Hi-Res 双金标加持。</p><p data-vmark="d869">相机方面，Redmi Note 11 Pro 搭载“一亿像素”超清相机，支持 12000×9000 高分辨率，拥有大像素 + 1/1.52″超大底，还有双原生 ISO 与 AI 算法加持，新增 9 款魔法换天。</p><p data-vmark="7fd2"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/d6142f4f-94c2-4d50-ac37-e8c22c14f615.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="45de"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/d4bd8d71-fe3c-4563-bcdb-70577295c98e.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="0865"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/6f76c18f-6225-471d-9a79-a8e167dc6ad6.jpeg" w="1268" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1268" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="8605">配置方面，Redmi Note 11 Pro 全球首发<span class="accentTextColor">天玑 920 处理器</span>，支持 WiFi 6 与蓝牙 5.2，配备 3.5mm 耳机孔、NFC、X 轴线性马达。其中，天玑 920 采用 6nm 工艺与 A78 大核，游戏性能提升 9%。</p><p data-vmark="c772"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/83700827-9372-46ad-93e5-f8f27839553f.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="3ea9"><img src="https://img.ithome.com/newsuploadfiles/2021/10/5b20f17e-6876-4043-a295-d70517f9567c.jpeg" w="1269" h="846" title="【IT之家开箱】Redmi Note 11/Pro+ 图赏：闪光沙/AG 玻璃设计工艺，33W/120W 快充" width="1269" height="547" referrerpolicy="no-referrer"></p><p data-vmark="fb11"><img
